page.title: 19Children's Games,N.Wingfield
page.content: {Organised school games Football,Netball,Cricket,Rounders -team games {Playground games Tiggy chain,Tiggy scarecrow,I-my -chasing games Skipping,Clapping games,Games based on T.V.series {Street games} Rallyco,British Bulldog, -chasing games Hide and Seek(also called Lurky), Various ball games(including football& spot){ {Games in the home Snooker,Pool,Darts,Chess, Various electronic games(using computers and videos) Top Trumps(card swapping game) {Wheels} Many children own bicycles and roller skates. {
